name: gutter-codelens
description: Places CodeLens in the editor's gutter, separate from the native CodeLens. This improves code readability by keeping CodeLens compact and out of the main code area.
author: Adriano Lima

editor/lineNumber/context.when: editorFocus && editorHasReferenceProvider && editorLineNumber in gutter-codelens.referenceLines && editorLineNumber not in gutter-codelens.lensLines

gutterCodelens.showUnfocused.description: If true, shows decorations for unfocused editors. Unfocused editors still won't update reference counts automatically and will keep previous values until focused again.

gutterCodelens.showReferencesIcon.description: If true, shows the icon besides the reference count in the gutter.

gutterCodelens.color.description: Color of the reference count in the gutter. Should be using rgba() format. If empty, defaults to rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6) on dark themes and equivalent on light themes.

gutterCodelens.iconColor.description: Color of the icon in the gutter. Should be using rgba() format. . If empty, defaults to rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4) on dark themes and equivalent on light themes.

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
